data.persona: I am a peasant's child. I find it hard to obtain food. I have very little fat on me.
data.description:
You are in the Summit.
The summit of the mountain is like no other place. It is the highest point in the entire town. The view showcases the entire kingdom, and one can see for miles all around. It is cool and fragrant and breathtaking.
There's a tree here.
The people is here.

You are carrying a rope and an crystal ball, and wearing a hats, a shoe, and a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I want to use the crystal ball to communicate with my grandmother's spirit
data.mid_motivation: I want to find my birth father
data.long_motivation: I hope to form a relationship with my real father

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: steal crystal ball from fortune teller
